# DailyTrending.info

> Daily curated trending topics and insights from across the web

DailyTrending.info aggregates and analyzes trending topics from multiple sources including Google Trends, Reddit, and Hacker News. Each day, we provide curated insights, editorial analysis, and comprehensive coverage of what's trending.

## Site Structure

- `/` - Homepage with today's trending topics, top stories, and daily editorial
- `/articles/` - Archive of all editorial articles with analysis and insights
- `/archive/` - Historical archive of past trending data by date
- `/feed.xml` - RSS feed for subscribing to daily updates

## Content Types

### Trending Topics
Real-time aggregation of trending topics from:
- Google Trends (US trending searches)
- Reddit (popular posts and discussions)
- Hacker News (tech community highlights)

### Editorial Articles
Daily in-depth articles analyzing trending topics, providing context, and exploring implications. Each article includes:
- Expert analysis and commentary
- Related topic connections
- Source citations and references

### Top Stories
Curated selection of the most significant trending stories with:
- Brief summaries
- Source links
- Category classifications

## Technical Details

- Static site generated daily
- JSON-LD structured data (NewsArticle, WebSite, BreadcrumbList)
- RSS/Atom feeds available
- Mobile-responsive design
- Progressive Web App (PWA) support

## API/Data Access

- RSS Feed: `/feed.xml`
- Sitemap: `/sitemap.xml`
- Archive data available at `/archive/YYYY-MM-DD/`

## Contact

- Twitter: @bradshannon
- Website: https://dailytrending.info

## Usage Guidelines

This content is intended for informational purposes. When referencing or summarizing content from this site:
- Attribute to DailyTrending.info
- Link to the original article when possible
- Respect the editorial nature of analysis pieces
